articles.title: Speech of Head of DPRK Delegation at Intergov't Meeting in Beijing
articles.content:
Speech of Head of DPRK Delegation at Intergov't Meeting in Beijing
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The High-Level Intergovernmental Meeting on the Midpoint Review of the Asia and Pacific Decade of Persons with Disabilities was held in Beijing, China from Nov. 27 to Dec. 1.
					 A DPRK delegation led by the ambassador for human rights of the Foreign Ministry took part in the meeting.
					
					 Referring to the efforts of the DPRK government for protection and promotion of human rights of the persons with disabilities, the head of the delegation said at the meeting:
					
					 It is an urgent issue above anything else to provide environment and condition for us to concentrate all our efforts on the peaceful economic construction to improve the people's livelihood if we are to take active part in the activities in the Asia and Pacific Decade of Persons with Disabilities and to fully implement the human rights instruments including the Convention on the Rights of the Persons with Disabilities.
					
					 Now in our country an all-people drive is in full swing to successfully carry out the 5-year strategy for national economic development from 2016 to 2020 under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 The 5-year strategic plan is aimed at laying foundation for sustainable economic development and decisively improving the people's livelihood. Once it is implemented, great advancement will be made in our activities for the Asia and Pacific Decade of Persons with Disabilities and in the implementation of the human rights conventions. 
					
					 However, our effort for this peaceful economic construction is faced with serious challenges. 
					
					 The sanctions imposed by the United States and its followers obstruct the enjoyment of human rights of our people in every way and encroach deep into the fields of activities for the protection of the persons with disabilities.  
					
					 Some countries under the strenuous pressure of the U.S. stopped the delivery of medical equipment and medicines for the maternal and infant health to our country and create indiscriminate difficulties even for the production of equipment, prosthesis and orthopedic tools for the persons with disabilities and the purchase of teaching aids and furnishings.
					
					 We hold that the inhuman sanctions of all sorts that trample down on the humanitarian ideals and the principles of international human rights instruments cannot be justified with anything and they should be put to an end immediately and unconditionally.
					
					 We reject politicization, selectivity and double standards in human rights and are also resolutely opposed to any attempt to use the human rights issues for ulterior political purposes. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the future policy direction, effective ways of performance and others, along with the midpoint review of the Asia and Pacific Decade of Persons with Disabilities, essence of which was to ensure that the disabled can take part in all fields of social activities. And the relevant Beijing Declaration and plan of action were adopted there.

articles.title: UN Under-Secretary-General Here
articles.content:
UN Under-Secretary-General Here
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Jeffrey Feltman, under-secretary-general of the United Nations, and his party arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: More Army-People Meetings Held to Celebrate Hwasong-15 Test-fire
articles.content:
More Army-People Meetings Held to Celebrate Hwasong-15 Test-fire
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Today witnessed army-people rallies in North Hwanghae Province and Kangwon and Ryanggang Province in celebration of the great victory achieved under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, which means the successful accomplishment of the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power.
					 Attending them were officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, industrial establishments, co-op farms, universities and officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and civilians from all walks of life and students.
					
					 The DPRK government statement was read out before celebration speeches at the events.
					
					 Speakers said that the successful test-fire of the new-type ICBM Hwasong-15 is a great event to be specially recorded in the history of the nation as it guarantees the eternal future of the country.
					
					 Nov. 29, Juche 106 (2017), would be proudly recorded as a significant victory day of Juche Korea in the history of the nation when an end was put to the history of nuclear blackmail and threat from the U.S. imperialists, they stressed.
					
					 They said that nobody can violate the sovereignty and rights to existence and development of the Korean people and that everyone can not and the DPRK can surely guarantee the peace of the region and the rest of the world with the tremendous nuclear deterrent.
					
					 They called for more dynamically stepping up the building of a powerful socialist country under the grand plan unfolded by the Seventh Congress of the WPK in the same spirit as displayed to bring the dawn of final victory.

articles.title: Publication Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
articles.content:
Publication Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A workshop took place at the Central Hall of Workers on Tuesday to mark the 1st publication anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "On Improving the Role of the UAWK in Accomplishing the Juche-Oriented Socialist Cause".
					 Present there were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and agricultural workers.
					
					 Read out at the workshop were papers explaining and proving the validity and scientific accuracy of the idea and theory set forth in the letter sent by Kim Jong Un to the participants in the 8th Congress of the UAWK.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Un's work is an immortal and great programme enabling the UAWK to develop into the eternal union of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the Party.
					
					 They stressed the need to thoroughly establish the Party's monolithic leadership system, the monolithic system of Kim Jong Un's leadership, in the union in order to model the whole union on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 They said that the union should resolutely defend and glorify the idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on rural construction and their exploits, with the socialist rural theses as the militant banner.
					
					 They expressed the resolve to deeply grasp the idea and theory set forth by Kim Jong Un in his work and fulfill their honorable mission and duty in the struggle to model the union on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Events of UAWK Held
articles.content:
Events of UAWK Held
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea sponsored an experience-share meeting of officials and an exhibition of its achievements at the Central Hall of Workers on Tuesday to mark the first publication anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "On Improving the Role of the UAWK in Accomplishing the Juche-Oriented Socialist Cause".
					 The experience-share meeting heard the successes made in the efforts to build up the union organizations into militant ranks strong in organizing ability and cohesion, true to the important tasks set forth in the work of the Supreme Leader.
					
					 Speakers noted that they have conducted in various forms and ways and in a fresh manner the five-point education, essence of which is education in the greatness of the great leaders, regarding it as a general task of the union to train all its members into the genuine Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist.
					
					 Presented to the exhibition were 230-odd exhibits, visual aid materials and multimedia programs of over 30 kinds showing the successes made by the Central Committee of the union and its organizations at all levels in the past one-year activities to carry out the tasks advanced in the letter of the Supreme Leader to the participants in the 8th Congress of the UAWK.

articles.title: Agricultural Sci-Tech Exhibition and Presentation Opens
articles.content:
Agricultural Sci-Tech Exhibition and Presentation Opens
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The 2017 national exhibition and presentation of successes made in the agricultural science and technology was opened with due ceremony at the Institute of Agricultural Science Tuesday.
					 The exhibition and presentation is divided into panels of agricultural crop seeds, scientific farming, agricultural chemistry, biological agrochemicals and veterinary science and animal husbandry.
					
					 Presented to it are more than 100 data on sci-tech achievements conducive to applying the scientific farming and stepping up the work to put the agricultural production on a scientific and modern basis.
					
					 On display are also more than 300 exhibits of 220-odd kinds.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Pak Thae Dok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea; Ko In Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Agriculture; Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission; officials concerned, and officials, scientists, technicians, teachers and postgraduate students from scientific and educational institutions and agricultural production units.
					
					 The exhibition and presentation will last until December 7.

articles.title: Joint Performance Goes on
articles.content:
Joint Performance Goes on
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance of the State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe is going on before full houses in Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province.
					 The venue of the performance is overcrowded with working people from industrial establishments and co-op farms including the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and students from different parts of the province.
					
					 Through the colorful numbers including male solo and male chorus "Korea, Forward under the Line of Simultaneously Developing the Two Fronts", light music "At a Go", male trio and male chorus "Along One Road of Socialism" and song and dance "To Be Proud of in World", the performance implants the audience with the truth that no force on the earth can check the heroic advance of the Korean people marching dynamically along the great Party with firm belief in the validity of their cause.
					
					 The performance continues.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Road Construction and River Improvement
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Road Construction and River Improvement
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Many achievements have been made in road construction and river improvement of the DPRK this year as part of the efforts to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea which called for pushing ahead with the land management.
					 More than 1,000 km-long roads and 200 bridges have been constructed or technically improved throughout the country.
					
					 South Phyongan Province upgraded the Phyongsong-Nampho road by removing nearly 200,000 cubic meters of earth and building thousands square meters of revetment.
					
					 Hongwon County of South Hamgyong Province finished the repair of tunnel pavements in a short span of time.
					
					 Similar projects were also carried out in Sinuiju City of North Phyongan Province, Munchon City of Kangwon Province, Unryul County of South Hwanghae Province, Kowon County of South Hamgyong Province and Paekam County of Ryanggang Province.
					
					 Successes were also made in river improvement.
					
					 Tokchon City of South Phyongan Province completed the project for embankment of vast riverside in a little more than two months, thus securing dwelling-houses and land against flood.
					
					 The same is true of Pyongyang City, Haeju City of South Hwanghae Province and other cities and counties.

articles.title: New Bud-grafting Method Developed
articles.content:
New Bud-grafting Method Developed
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Economic Forest Institute of the Academy of Forest Science in the DPRK developed a new bud-grafting method to increase fruit yield of Evodia daniellii trees over 2.5 times.
					 The institute has multiplied the number of fruiting trees by grating branches of trees, which have yielded for over three years, on the branches of fruitless trees.
					
					 On this basis, it established a new bud-grafting method to improve Evodia daniellii forests.
					
					 The institute has made such achievements as turning Evodia daniellii forests in ten cities and counties, including Jongju City and Unjon County of North Phyongan Province, Myonggan County of North Hamgyong Province, Jongphyong County of South Hamgyong Province and Anbyon County of Kangwon Province, into high-yielding ones from February.
					
					 According to Ri Hyon Song, director of the institute, it plans to improve all the Evodia daniellii forests across the country within 3-4 years.

articles.title: DPRK Will Keep to Path of Socialism under Banner of Self-reliance: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Keep to Path of Socialism under Banner of Self-reliance: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is a power of Juche making a victorious drive under the uplifted banner of independence and self-reliance, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Tuesday.
					 Noting that the invincibility of Korean-style socialism lies in steadily carrying forward the brilliant tradition of self-reliance with the Juche idea as the guiding ideology of the revolution and in effecting a steady surge on all fronts of the revolution and construction with the might of self-reliance, the article goes on:
					
					 Socialism advancing with self-reliance as a driving force is ever-victorious. This is the historical review of the Korean revolution.
					
					 No matter how grave the situation may become, how many times the world may change, how severe the revolution may become and how huge task the Korean people may face, there can never be any deflection in their fighting mode and the mode of advance of our country.
					
					 We have built the socialist country of independence, self-supporting and self-defence in our own fighting mode and creation mode in reliance on our own strength, technology and resources, not in reliance on others.
					
					 We have built up powerful strength and displayed the ever-victorious spirit century after century despite the imperialists' persistent aggression moves and sanctions and blockade as we have struggled in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will keep to the path of socialism under the uplifted banner of self-reliance.

articles.title: No Force Can Check Advance of DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
No Force Can Check Advance of DPRK: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The development and advancement of the strategic weapons of the DPRK are pursuant to the legitimate measure for self-defence to safeguard the sovereignty and the territorial integrity of the country, defend the peaceful life of the people and guarantee the lasting peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the region from the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail policy and nuclear threat, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary.
					 It is only the U.S. and its followers who are at a loss, being taken aback by the success in the test-fire of the new type inter-continental ballistic rocket of the DPRK, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 This clearly proves once again that quite just are the strategic option and the line of simultaneous development of the two fronts pursued by the DPRK which is making every effort for independence and peace, and that no one on the earth can block the advance of the DPRK.
					
					 The enemies are finding fault with the historic cause of the state nuclear force of the DPRK that has been completed on the highest level. But this is just a meaningless act of those aimed to undermine the nature of self-defence.
					
					 As long as the interests of the DPRK are not encroached upon, the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK will never pose threat to any country and region.
					
					 As a responsible nuclear power and a peace-loving state both in name and reality, the DPRK will exert every possible effort to defend the world peace and stability.
					
					 Inexhaustible is the might of the DPRK advancing along the road of independence, and the historic cause of achieving the national reunification and the eternal prosperity of the nation will surely be realized by the united efforts of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Papers Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Largest-ever Joint Aerial Drill
articles.content:
Papers Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Largest-ever Joint Aerial Drill
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The largest-ever joint aerial drill started by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces in the sky above south Korea from December 4 came under fire by the leading newspapers here Tuesday.
					 Rodong Sinmun says the Trump group which looked far into the final ruin of the U.S. in the DPRK's completion of the nuclear force is trying to find a way-out in the provocation of the second Korean war.
					
					 The simultaneous introduction of several nuclear carrier task forces into the Korean peninsula and to waters around it and the massive shipment of nuclear strategic bombers for consecutive joint naval drill and joint aerial drill are not just aimed to put military threat on the DPRK, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 It is a trite method employed by aggressors to mount a sudden preemptive attack while pretending to conduct war drills.
					
					 The U.S. continues to hold largest-ever nuclear war drills after amassing war means equipped with the function of preemptive attack in south Korea and its vicinity. This proves that their bellicose attempt to bring down the DPRK by force has gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 The U.S. is openly disclosing its intention to realize its ambition for bringing down the DPRK by tyrannical force but the DPRK will never be brow-beaten.
					
					 Minju Joson derides the enemies' intention to browbeat the DPRK with Stealth fighters as an expression of ill-advised bravery of the boss of gangsters and tyrants, jeering them just as a group of tiger moths flying into fire only to perish in it.
					
					 The paper says that the reckless moves of the U.S. and the puppet forces only convince the DPRK that it was quite right when it decided to bolster the powerful war deterrence in every way, true to the invariable line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Authorities for Depending on Outside Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Authorities for Depending on Outside Forces
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Defense Minister Song Yong Mu and Foreign Minister Kang Kyong Hwa met the American masters including a delegation of the Armed Services Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives that visited Seoul, and earnestly begged them to expand the rotation deployment of U.S. strategic assets in the Korean Peninsula and "strengthen alliance," talking rubbish that bilateral "close cooperation" would be "strong deterrent message" to someone.
					 In September the south Korean chief executive at the talks with Trump asked him to expand rotation deployment of U.S. strategic assets in south Korea.
					
					 These moves were a revelation of the sinister intention to hurt the compatriots in the north by force with the backing of outsiders, and sycophantic and treacherous act of making south Korea the U.S. nuclear logistic base for aggression and offering of a nuclear war, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities run amuck with the moves to stifle the compatriots by depending on outsiders. It is as foolish an act as pulling the noose of death around their necks.
					
					 They turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East and the most dangerous nuclear advanced base of the U.S. Not content with this, they are frantic to impose disaster of nuclear war upon the nation by introducing U.S. strategic assets at random. This is the treacherous act of deserving a severe punishment.
					
					 It is ridiculous that the south Korean puppet authorities try to hurt the DPRK in military collusion with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK is the nuclear power of Juche and the world's military power as it has successfully realized the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force. It will never pardon those who dare hurt its dignity and sovereignty but mercilessly punish them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Censures Abe Group's Intention to Secure Capabilities for Preemptive Attack
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Censures Abe Group's Intention to Secure Capabilities for Preemptive Attack
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe at the recent full-dress session of the House of Councilors said it is "necessary to actively examine the possession of the capabilities for preemptive attack on enemy bases" in order to defend the lives of people and their peaceful life from the "missile attack from the DPRK".
					 In the meantime, the Japanese reactionaries have gone zealous in their moves to spread the story about "threat from the DPRK" at home and abroad through frequent citizens' evacuation and counteraction drill simulating the rocket attack from the DPRK and to build up the public opinion in support of the securement of the capabilities for preemptive attack under that pretext.
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday denounces the moves of the Abe group for securing the capabilities for preemptive attack as a very dangerous military act rendering the regional situation tenser and gravely threatening the peace in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 From the first days of its office, the Abe group has persistently worked to justify their moves for becoming a military giant and launching overseas aggression while crying out for "breakaway from the postwar system" and revision of "pacifist constitution", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Now they are openly calling for securing the capabilities for preemptive attack, in disregard of the "pacifist constitution". This is aimed to launch reinvasion through an open preemptive attack.
					
					 In order to create a pretext for it, the Abe group is spreading the "story about missile threat from the DPRK" and inciting the hostility toward the DPRK and the "security crisis." The aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries is to completely reorganize the "Self-Defence Forces" into those of attack type in the near future and retrogressively revise the constitution.
					
					 Asia is not what it used to be in the past and Korea is not what it used to be in the past. The Abe group has to clearly understand this. If it drives the militarist chariot as crazily as now in pursuance of the U.S. in defiance of this changed reality, the group will push Japan into the abyss of destruction, the commentary warns.

articles.title: Minju Joson Censures Wild Act of Japan
articles.content:
Minju Joson Censures Wild Act of Japan
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Japan foreign minister during his interview prior to the visit to Russia said that "north Korea's rocket launch poses threat of unprecedented level" and "it is necessary to force Pyongyang to change its policy" in collaboration with the international community. He repeated the same utterances in Russia, also.
					 The Japanese prime minister, when meeting French businessmen, called on the "international community to get united and put maximum pressure on north Korea", saying that its missiles have France in their firing ranges".
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says this only reveals the disgusting nature of the political dwarf unable to look far into an inch ahead.
					
					 Japan's despicable act is as foolish as entering into the striking range of the DPRK itself, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Japan has to clearly understand that the DPRK will exert every possible effort to serve its noble purpose of defending the world peace and stability as a responsible nuclear power and a peace-loving state.
					
					 But it will destroy the hostile forces that encroach upon the sovereignty of the country, whoever they might be and wherever they may be.
					
					 Japan had better stop the foolish act of inviting misfortune, as it fails to look far into an inch ahead, being seized by the frenzy for confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Disgraceful S. Korean Authorities
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Disgraceful S. Korean Authorities
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Which is the worst colony of modern version in the world and who is its "master"?
					 The answer can be found in the recent meeting of the Joint Committee on "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) between the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 At the meeting on SOFA which stipulated the status of the brigandish U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea, the U.S. refused to meet south Korea's demands at all over the discussed issues.
					
					 The U.S. denied opening of the contents of the meeting under the pretence of "military secrets" and turned down the issues of the reparation for the victims of the crimes committed by GIs and sharing burden for de-pollution of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' bases in south Korea, talking about "intensifying preventive effort" against GI crimes and the "constructive discussion".
					
					 In a word, the meeting, which was run through with pressure and submission, proved that the relations between the U.S. and south Korea are master-servant relationship from A to Z.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life strongly denounce the humiliating behavior of the authorities who kept mum about the U.S. arbitrary practices at the meeting.
					
					 Now the U.S. forces are present in not a few countries and regions and there are agreements on the status of forces. However, such slavery document can hardly be found in the world as the U.S.-south Korea SOFA.
					
					 Under this humiliating "agreement", the GIs present in south Korea have enjoyed extraterritorial privileges beyond imagination for more than half a century and the sufferings of south Koreans from it are untold.
					
					 Typical is the death of Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son, two schoolgirls of south Korea who were driven over by an armored car of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces. 
					
					 Under the pretence of "military need" the U.S. have installed in different parts of south Korea military bases and facilities at its will, turning the areas into a barren land. Furthermore, it has deprived south Korea of money running into astronomical figures every year, under the name of "defence cost sharing".
					
					 South Korea is suffering all sorts of humiliation and sacrifice under the slavery "agreement" in the present era of independence. This is a disgrace and insult to the nation.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities bragged that they would talk something necessary to the U.S. But now they keep mum in bad shape at over such issues related to the life and safety of people as reparation for victims of GI crimes and cost for de-pollution. Until when does south Korea suffer such disgrace?
					
					 What is more shameful is that the south Korean authorities advertise about "joint efforts for the strengthened alliance" though they got a cold reception at the meeting.
					
					 They are pro-U.S. sycophantic lackeys without an iota of soul of the nation as they turn away their face from the reality, in which the aggressors legitimately commit inhumane evils under SOFA, and beg for "alliance".
					
					 It is the mindset of the south Korean public to abrogate the humiliating unequal "agreement" and drive the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, root cause of misfortune and sufferings, out of south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly understand the demand of candlelight demonstrators desirous of independence against the U.S., far from getting hell-bent on confrontation with the compatriots while begging for the permanent U.S. military presence.

articles.title: U.S. Launches Largest-ever Joint Air War Exercises in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Launches Largest-ever Joint Air War Exercises in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The brigandish U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers are getting more reckless in the moves to stifle the DPRK militarily.
					 They kicked off in south Korea on Monday Vigilant Ace, joint air war exercises targeting the DPRK, on the largest scale.
					
					 Involved in the rehearsal to last until Dec. 8 are the 5th, 7th, 11th and 12th air forces, marine corps and naval forces of the U.S. deployed in its mainland and the Pacific operational theater including Guam and Japan and more than 140 planes of various missions including nuclear strategic bomber B-1B, stealth fighters F-22A, F-35A, F-35B and electronic jamming plane EA-18G and all troops and 90-odd planes of the south Korean puppet air force.
					
					 Across south Korea, they are now hell-bent on the exercises simulating an all-out war against the DPRK, including drills to strike the state leadership and nuclear and ballistic rocket bases, air fields, naval bases and other major objects of the DPRK and its command posts of frontline units, armored equipment and personnel and long-range artillery units.
					
					 Particularly, the U.S. imperialists are staging an ultra-precision strike drill with high intensity just like in a real war focused on "removing" the DPRK's state leadership and core facilities by massively introducing the ultramodern stealth fighters.
					
					 What's more serious is that the warmongers show an ill-boding movement for real military action to carry out a preemptive attack on the DPRK with the exercises as an occasion.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists already issued to the air forces involved in the exercises an "order on air duty" for striking at least 700 major targets of the Korean People's Army all at once, under the OPLAN 5015 for preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, they go recklessly to astonish someone by floating public opinion that the present deployment of six F-22As, called "most powerful fighter", in south Korea is for a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Encouraged by the American master's bluffing, the south Korean puppet forces are behaving imprudently, turning into a theatre of war games even the sky above the Military Demarcation Line area to say nothing of the sky above east and west seas of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists already versed themselves in the procedure for carrying out an aggression war from the sea through recent high-intensity joint naval drills with their three nuclear aircraft carrier strike groups involved. And they are now again engaged in the largest-ever combined air exercises with the involvement of warplanes including B-1B and stealth fighters. The fact serves as clear evidence that they have carefully made preliminary arrangements for provoking a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Owing to the U.S. imperialist warmongers' extremely reckless war hysteria, a grave situation is prevailing in the Korean peninsula that a nuclear war may break out any moment.
					
					 The stern reality clearly shows that the U.S. is a mastermind of tension in the peninsula and a harasser of global peace and the U.S. imperialists remain unchanged in their scheme to stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 Such reckless war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers will only accelerate their miserable end.

articles.title: Full-time Employment of Part-time Teachers Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Full-time Employment of Part-time Teachers Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Thirteen labor and social organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Abolition of Instable Labor formed a joint measure committee for the full-time employment of part-time teachers on Nov. 30, according to Chamsesang, a south Korean internet newspaper.
					 The joint measure committee held a press conference in demand of the full-time employment of part-time teachers.
					
					 Speakers there stressed that the full-time employment is a starting point for ensuring equality in the educational field.
					
					 They thrust a document demanding the elimination of discrimination against part-time teachers to the puppet Human Rights Committee.

articles.title: Leaflets Urging Detention of Lee Myung Bak Scattered in S. Korea
articles.content:
Leaflets Urging Detention of Lee Myung Bak Scattered in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A million leaflets demanding the detention of Lee Myung Bak and the confiscation of his properties embezzled through irregularities were found in Seoul of south Korea on Dec. 3, according to Minjok Ilbo, a south Korean internet newspaper.
					 The leaflets were scattered in several hundred parts of subways, residential areas, shopping centers and streets.
					
					 The leaflet scattering was aimed to express the people's indignation at Lee Myung Bak and its coteries still stalking along the streets, it was reported.

articles.title: Bird Flu Virus Detected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Virus Detected in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Highly pathogenic bird flu virus was again detected on Jeju Island in the wake of a similar case on Nov. 23, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The excrement of a wild bird found on the island was finally confirmed to be H5N6, a highly pathogenic bird flu virus.
					
					 Even in winter, bird flu occurred or highly pathogenic virus was detected in several regions of south Korea, raising uneasiness among people.

articles.title: Fishing Boat Capsizes in Waters off S. Korea
articles.content:
Fishing Boat Capsizes in Waters off S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A fishing boat collided with an oil tanker in waters around Ryonghung Island off Ongjin County in Inchon City on Dec. 3, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 The small fishing boat capsized, leaving one dead and several missing. Survivors were unconscious.

articles.title: Strict Probe into Crimes of IS Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Strict Probe into Crimes of IS Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The People's Party of south Korea called a seminar for abolition of the Intelligence Service's evils on Nov. 30, demanding a probe into the crimes committed by the IS to disband the Unified Progressive Party and abduct the DPRK women citizens, according to OhmyNews, an internet newspaper.
					The speakers there stressed it is high possibility of the IS' intervention in the abduction case from the light that the case happened about a week before the general election in 2016 and that the women did not go through normal "entry" procedures.
					
					Turning to the disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party, they demanded a probe into the IS' intervention and punishment of those responsible, saying the direct cause of the disbandment was its manipulation of documents to engineer the plot of rebellion.
					
					They called for a thorough probe into a number of evils in which the IS interfered.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Angola
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Angola on December 1.
					 Amalia Alexandr, international secretary of the Angolan Women's Organization, was elected chairwoman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the exploits of Kim Jong Il, the peerlessly great man, who performed for the prosperity and independent reunification of the country and global independence on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Russia on Nov. 30.
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits and organize political and cultural events including a seminar on the sixth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Foreign Media Observe DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
Foreign Media Observe DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and websites of Brazil and Denmark observed the DPRK's successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 The Brazilian newspaper Agua Verde carried an article on Nov. 30, illustrated with the photos of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. It praised the DPRK as a nuclear and rocket power, commenting that the recent successful test-fire is another sweeping victory of the DPRK.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Cursed U.S. imperialists, it is now your turn.
					
					 Your military bases on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity will be destroyed.
					
					 Your mega cities will be stricken by DPRK's rockets tipped with A- and H-bombs.
					
					 The cowardly U.S. will have to pay dearly for its crimes in many countries including Korea.
					
					 A similar article was posted on Marcia Verde, an internet homepage of Brazil, on the same day.
					
					 The Danish newspaper Ekstra Bladet noted in an article on Nov. 29:
					
					 North Korea test-fired a new-type missile whose power and range are stronger and longer than previous ones. It is called Hwasong-15 missile.
					
					 The U.S. has not enough information about the military muscle of north Korea including its nuclear weapons and missiles.
					
					 It is impossible to totally destroy mobile launchers and submarines through a single preemptive strike.

articles.title: Indian Personages Censure U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Indian Personages Censure U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Personages of various political parties and organizations of India bitterly denounced the U.S. for putting the DPRK back on the list of "state sponsors of terrorism" on Nov. 21.
					 Atul Kumar Anjan, secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, the general secretary of the Indian National Congress Party, Harising Khang, a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), G. Debarajan, secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, Vijay Jolly, senior leader of the Indian People's Party, and Suneet Chopra, secretary general of the All-India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, noted in a joint statement:
					
					 We strongly reject everything fabricated by the U.S. in a bid to pressurize the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK with solid national defence capabilities for self-defence is a genuine people's country.
					
					 The Korean people have the history of defeating the U.S. for the first time in the world.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to withdraw its nuclear weapons and troops from the Korean peninsula and respect the unanimous desire of all Koreans for settling the reunification issue by their own efforts.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for peace and progress.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion intergubernamental de alto nivel de Asia-Pacifico
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion intergubernamental de alto nivel de Asia-Pacifico
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del 27 de noviembre al primero de diciembre en Beijing la reunion intergubernamental de alto nivel sobre la revision intermedia del plan decenario de la region de Asia-Pacifico para las personas con discapacidades. 
					Participo en la ocasion la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el embajador encargado de derechos humanos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el jefe de la delegacion coreana enumero los esfuerzos del gobierno de la RPDC por proteger y fomentar los derechos humanos de los discapacitados.
					
					Para tomar parte activa en el Plan Decenario (2013-2022) para las Personas con Discapacidades de la Region de Asia-Pacifico e implementar plenamente las convenciones sobre los derechos humanos, incluso la Convencion sobre los Derechos de Personas con Discapacidades, resulta imprescindible para la RPDC preparar el ambiente y las condiciones favorables a concentrarse en la construccion economica pacifica para el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo. 
					
					Ahora, en nuestro pais se desarrolla una campana de todo el pueblo para cumplir exitosamente la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de economia nacional desde 2016 hasta 2020 bajo la sabia orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC. 
					
					El plan de estrategia quinquenal tiene la meta de asentar el fundamento de desarrollo sostenible de la economia nacional y mejorar decisivamente la vida de la poblacion. Una vez cumplido, se lograra gran avance en las actividades y esfuerzos de nuestro pais por la implementacion del plan decenario para personas discapacitadas y las convenciones sobre derechos humanos. 
					
					Pero, tropiezan con graves desafios nuestros esfuerzos por la construccion economica pacifica. 
					
					Las sanciones impuestas por EE.UU. y sus satelites obstaculizan el disfrute de derechos humanos del pueblo coreano y extienden sus garras hasta a las esferas de proteccion de los derechos de los discapacitados. 
					
					Pretextando la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, algunos paises rendidos ante la presion obstinada de EE.UU. paran el suministro de equipos medicos y medicinas y ponen obstaculos hasta en la produccion de equipos y aparatos ortopedicos para los discapacitados y en la compra de equipamientos escolares para los infantes discapacitados. 
					
					Son injustificables de ninguna manera y deben ser paradas incondicional e inmediatamente las sanciones inhumanas de todas formas que infringen el ideal humanitario y los principios de las convenciones internacionales sobre los derechos humanos. 
					
					Rechazamos tajantemente la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero en el tema de derechos humanos y cualquier intento de abusarlo para siniestros objetivos politicos. 
					
					La reunion hizo balance intermedio de la implementacion del plan decenario para personas discapacitadas de la region de Asia-Pacifico que se fundamenta en incorporar a los discapacitados en todas las esferas de actividades sociales, discutio el rumbo de la politica posterior y los remedios efectivos de su ejecucion y adopto la Declaracion de Beijing y el Plan de Accion.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia la confrontacion de Japon con la RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia la confrontacion de Japon con la RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la entrevista ofrecida hace poco en visperas de su visita a Rusia, el canciller japones disparateo que el "lanzamiento de cohete del Norte de Corea deviene la amenaza de nivel sin precedente" y "es necesario hacer a Pyongyang cambiar su politica" bajo la cooperacion de toda la comunidad internacional, y lo repitio durante su permanencia en Rusia.
					 En las conversaciones con los economicos francos, el premier japones dijo que "Francia tambien esta al alcance de los misiles del Norte de Corea y la sociedad internacional debe unirse e imponer la maxima presion a el".
					
					  Esto revela por si mismo la figura del enano politico.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					  La conducta bochornosa de Japon no pasa de ser la locura absurda que se aproxima al golpe de la RPDC.
					
					  Japon debe tener presente.
					
					  Siendo una potencia nuclear responsable y Estado pacifista, la RPDC hara todos sus esfuerzos por defender la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					  Pero, no perdonara jamas a las fuerzas hostiles que violan nuestra soberania y les aniquilara implacablemente.
					
					  Japon, enloquecido en la confrontacion con la RPDC, debe poner inmediato fin a las locuras suicidas.

articles.title: ACNC insiste en abolicion del "Acuerdo Administrativo" EE.UU-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC insiste en abolicion del "Acuerdo Administrativo" EE.UU-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, tuvo lugar la reunion del comite conjunto EE.UU.-Sudcorea del "Acuerdo sobre el Estatus de las Fuerzas" ("Acuerdo Administrativo"), que estipula la posicion bandidesca de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes en el Sur de Corea.
					En la ocasion, EE.UU. no acepto nada de las demandas de los titeres surcoreanos en cuanto a los problemas debatidos en la reunion.
					
					La parte norteamericana nego la exigencia de dar publicidad el contenido de la reunion con el pretexto del "secreto militar" y dio espaldas al problema de la indemnizacion a las victimas de crimenes cometidos por las tropas norteamericanas, la carga de gastos por la eliminacion de contaminacion ambiental en las bases militares norteamericanas y otros temas, hablando del fortalecimiento de los "esfuerzos para prevenir" los crimenes de los uniformados norteamericanos y de la "consulta constructiva".
					
					Esta reunion mostro una vez mas que las relaciones entre EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea son las entre dueno y sirviente.
					
					La arbitrariedad de EE.UU. y la humillacion del Sur de Corea provocan ahora la repulsion de distintos estratos surcoreanos.
					
					En el mundo hay muchos paises y regiones donde estacionan las tropas norteamericanas y fueron firmados los tratados sobre su estacionamiento. Pero, es el unico el Sur de Corea donde existe el documento de esclavitud como "Acuerdo Administrativo" EE.UU.-Sudcorea.
					
					Gracias a tal "acuerdo", durante mas de un medio siglo las tropas yanquis ocupantes en el Sur de Corea disfrutan del privilegio extraterritorial, y al contrario, los habitantes surcoreanos sufren incontables desgracias.
					
					Lo testimonian el caso de las alumnas Sin Hyo Sun y Sim Mi Son, atropelladas por el carro blindado norteamericano, y otros incidentes.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de "necesidades militares", EE.UU. instala en cualquier lugar surcoreano las bases y establecimientos militares y convierte los solares ocupados en la tierra esteril. Bajo rotulo de la "cuota para la defensa", recoge cada ano una suma astronomica de dinero.
					
					En la actual epoca aspirante a la independencia, el Sur de Corea paga con muchos sacrificios en virtud de tal "acuerdo", lo que es la verguenza y deshonra de la nacion.
					
					?Hasta cuando sufriran tal ignominia las actuales autoridades surcoreanas, que antes fanfarroneaban que hablarian resueltamente "No" a EE.UU. y ahora estan desanimados sin decir nada en cuanto a los problemas relacionados con la seguridad de vida de la poblacion?
					
					Lo mas absurdo es que los menospreciados titeres surcoreanos publican como si "se lograran activamente los esfuerzos comunes para el fortalecimiento de la alianza".
					
					Es lamentable el proceder de los traidores proyanquis surcoreanos que suplican la "alianza" a su patron norteamericano haciendo vista gorda a la realidad de que los agresores perpetran legalmente las atrocidades antieticos bajo el amparo del "Acuerdo" en cuestion.
					
					La poblacion surcoreana exige abolir el documento humillante y desigual y expulsar a las tropas norteamericanas, origen de todas las desgracias.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben prestar oidos a esa demanda, en vez de mendigar la ocupacion perenne de EE.UU. y recurrir freneticamente a la confrontacion fratricida.
